headline: TKO Group Holdings to Participate in the Goldman Sachs Communacopia + Technology Conference
summary: NEW YORK, August 21, 2025--TKO Group Holdings, Inc. ("TKO" or the "Company") (NYSE: TKO), a premium sports and entertainment company, announced that its President and Chief Operating Officer, Mark Shapiro, will participate in the Goldman Sachs Communacopia + Technology Conference on Wednesday, September 10, 2025 at 1:50 p.m. ET (10:50 a.m. PT) in San Francisco, CA.

headline: TKO Group Holdings: Earnings Growth Outlook Is Very Clear
summary: TKO Group posts strong Q2 results and signs a $7.7B UFC media deal, with solid FCF backing a $2B buyback for double-digit returns. See why TKO stock is a buy.
